address: 12 Phan ƒê√¨nh Ph√πng, T√¢n An, Ninh Ki·ªÅu, C·∫ßn Th∆°
comment: Coffee corner along the cool, airy sidewalk near Ninh Kieu pedestrian street. The 24/7 restaurant is very crowded in the evening During the day, there is a clean, cold roof inside The drink menu is diverse and reasonably priced.

address: 12 Phan ƒê√¨nh Ph√πng, T√¢n An, Ninh Ki·ªÅu, C·∫ßn Th∆°
comment: Drinking water is out of the question because it's each person's personal taste whether they like this brand or not. But in terms of service, the staff should be retrained: if they do something wrong and say that the customer doesn't speak, if they ask for tea or boiling water, they have to repeat it over and over again until they are almost leaving. It's a crime because they're all young students working part-time jobs. They deserve to be properly trained so they can progress and take solid steps in life. Another minus point of the restaurant is that the air conditioner is not cold enough, so you have to sit and drink water but also have to watch and fight mosquitoes! Advise everyone to sit outside as it will be cooler. Parking in the building is free when you present the ticket to the security guard or the ticket left on the counter.

address: 12 Phan ƒê√¨nh Ph√πng, T√¢n An, Ninh Ki·ªÅu, C·∫ßn Th∆°
comment: The Trung Nguyen branch here has quite a comfortable space, cool air conditioning, and the service staff is quite good and pleasant. The shop's design is very luxurious and bright, the staff is constantly sweeping and mopping the floor so it's always shiny. The experience of my drink is also quite good, mainly characterized by pure Trung Nguyen coffee. This is the most beautiful Trung Nguyen branch I have currently experienced. The parking lot is quite airy and clean near Sense City and restaurants. 9.5/10.  (*) The shop has quite a few electrical outlets so it's not for office workers or group workers!

address: 12 Phan ƒê√¨nh Ph√πng, T√¢n An, Ninh Ki·ªÅu, C·∫ßn Th∆°
comment: Clean restaurant, cool air conditioning, delicious drinks, diverse menu! Cold brew coffee is quite delicious! The atmosphere is great, the restaurant style is very good! In the evening, there are outdoor tables and chairs that are very cool. Will visit many more times!

comment: The restaurant has a nice location, reasonable drink prices, large and airy space, my husband and I really like it. I buy TN's Creative powder coffee to drink at home every day and when I drink filter coffee here, I'm a bit disappointed. Or the shop can sell other types of better quality to give customers more choices.

comment: In general, it is as normal as other E shops in the chain. There is space inside and a sidewalk outside. I tried sitting inside for a bit but it was a bit stuffy. The air conditioner is too weak compared to the area of the shop so it doesn't penetrate anything. After a while I could no longer stand it so I went outside for fresh air. The view from the sidewalk is surrounded by streets and luxury hotels. In general, there are views for those who are interested in checking in. You should try it and let me know.
